c770429df6ce.title: Excellent list with vibrant and beautiful photos.

paragraphs.name: a8ab
paragraphs.text: Excellent list with vibrant and beautiful photos. I always thought food pictures were too first world anyway, and were subject to failure due to bad (read non natural) lighting and being out of focus. There are too many smeary images because the phone lens is filthy, too. And yes, I am a Boomerang hater. There, I said it.

paragraphs.name: 464c
paragraphs.text: Interesting points. Keeping things fresh is enjoyable on IG, but I don’t have the followers to back that up. I left it as it seemed limiting for what I ultimately wanted to do: tell stories. Of course, people like Humans of NY do that pretty well, but I mean fiction ones. Any hints on that? Journalism in general?

paragraphs.name: 7ba5
paragraphs.text: Great article. I’m glad you mentioned about the hashtags and motivational quotes, they are kinda of played out in 2017. You can only motivate so much! Also those workout photos are played out as well!
